summary: This is a December 16, 2020 letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to defense counsel in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, transmitting discovery materials including a UBS subpoena return. The letter references a protective order and designates the materials as confidential.

events.title: Discovery Production to Maxwell Defense
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office transmits discovery materials, including a UBS subpoena return, to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense counsel.

events.title: Protective Order Issued
events.description: A protective order was issued in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, governing the confidentiality of discovery materials.

locations: 33 West 19th Street-4th Fl. New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a formal discovery production letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team.
The production includes a UBS subpoena return dated December 15, 2020, indicating ongoing financial investigation.
All materials are governed by a protective order dated July 31, 2020, and are designated as confidential.
The document references the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (MN).
Acting U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss signed the letter, indicating high-level oversight of the prosecution.
